articles.author: Malay Mail
articles.title: Google rolls out a new notice to help users find reliable information - Malay Mail
articles.description: SAN FRANCISCO, June 29 ― American search giant Google is developing a new feature to warn users about unreliable information in its search results. This new tool in the fight against fake news will soon be available in Europe. Google is making a slight change…
articles.content:
Google is making changes to Search to help users evaluate information reliability. Shutterstock pic via ETX Studio

articles.author: Alistair Smout, Reuters
articles.title: Mix-and-match approach boosts immune response of AstraZeneca shot, study finds - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: The data provides support for the decision of some European countries that have started offering alternatives to AstraZeneca as a second shot after the vaccine was linked to rare blood clots.
articles.content: LONDON—A mixed schedule of vaccines where a shot of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine is given four weeks after an AstraZeneca shot will produce better immune responses than giving another dose of AstraZenec… [+2240 chars]

articles.author: Leroy Leo
articles.title: Serum Institute applies for European regulator's EUA amid vaccine passport issues - Mint
articles.description: Move follows reports that people vaccinated with Covishield weren’t being allowed to enter EU.Reports said EU’s vaccine passport recognizes Astra-Zeneca’s Vaxzevria but not Covishield
articles.content:
